item.title: The Death of My Brother Samba
item.description: DEDICATIONOn the 6th of March at 2 pm, I had completed all necessary preparations for my departure to Istanbul. After bidding farewell to a select group of close friends, I embarked on my journey. While at the university, I enjoyed a leisurely lunch and snapped some photographs with a dear friend, Aziz, which I will share with you shortly. After lunch, I returned to my dormitory, where I gathered my luggage and backpacks before making my way to the bus station.
